Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Human Soldier', 3: "If we hadn't found you on the road, you would have already been dead.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "She's still alive, right? I can still see Luna... right?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'She has already been processed and disposed of...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'In the last stage of the experiment, an immensely strong Punishing Virus reaction appeared inside her—it took over and corrupted her almost instantly.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Which means that Luna became a Corrupted. We had to dispose of her.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "I'm sorry, but you'll never see her again.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Black-clad Man', 3: 'If the experiment succeeds, they can all undertake defense missions in this area and protect everyone.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'When I become a Construct and have to be somewhere else, you can sleep with the plushie as if it were me.'}
{2: 'Black-clad Man', 3: "It's about time, children. Let's go."}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "Lucia... I don't want to part with you..."}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "But you've been protecting me all this time... You've done so much for me..."}
